trans-unit.source: Provides information about a control that can be used by an accessibility application.
trans-unit.target: 提供可供協助工具應用程式使用之控制項的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms has accessibility support built in, and provides information about your application that enables it to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows Form 有內建的協助工具支援，並提供您的應用程式，讓它能夠搭配協助工具用戶端應用程式的相關資訊。

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications are: screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: 協助工具用戶端應用程式的範例包括： 畫面加大和檢閱者公用程式、 語音輸入公用程式、 螢幕小鍵盤、 其他輸入的裝置及鍵盤加強公用程式。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes you will want to provide additional information to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 有時候您會想要提供給協助工具用戶端應用程式的其他資訊。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式可以提供這項額外資訊。

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有限的協助工具資訊的現有控制項，將控制項的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>會報告至協助工具用戶端應用程式的屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, if you require more accessibility information to be included with your control, you can write your own class deriving from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes.
trans-unit.target: 或者，如果您需要其他協助工具資訊，以包含您的控制項，您可以撰寫您自己的類別衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>類別。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing your own control that is not derived from the common controls or you require such operations as hit testing within your control, you should create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for your control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您要撰寫您自己的控制項，不衍生自通用控制項，或您需要這類作業，作為點擊測試，在控制項中，您應該建立<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>藉由呼叫控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, you must also override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，您也必須覆寫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChildCount%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: To get or set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A> property, you must add a reference to the `Accessibility` assembly installed with the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibilityObject%2A>屬性，您必須加入參考`Accessibility`安裝.NET framework 組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about accessible objects, see the Active Accessibility section of the MSDN Library.
trans-unit.target: 如需可存取物件的詳細資訊，請參閱 MSDN Library 的＜Active Accessibility＞一節。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> class and creates a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for the derived class to use.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立衍生自的核取方塊控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>類別，並建立自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>使用衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> by default so it appears as a toggle button.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別`MyCheckBox`，具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button>依預設，它會顯示為的切換按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>類別`MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`，覆寫外觀差異列入考量的三個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> class and creates a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for the derived class to use.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立衍生自的核取方塊控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>類別，並建立自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>使用衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> by default so it appears as a toggle button.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別`MyCheckBox`，具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button>依預設，它會顯示為的切換按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>類別`MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`，覆寫外觀差異列入考量的三個屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="ownerControl" /> parameter value is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ownerControl" /> 參數值為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the default action of the object.
trans-unit.target: 取得描述物件之預設動作的字串。

trans-unit.source: Not all objects have a default action.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的物件都有預設動作。

trans-unit.source: A description of the default action for an object, or <see langword="null" /> if this object has no default action.
trans-unit.target: 物件預設動作的描述；若此物件沒有預設動作，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" /> 的描述。

trans-unit.source: A string describing the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 描述 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" /> 的字串。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a string that represents the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含一個字串，此字串表示與這個可存取物件相關的說明檔之路徑。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Gets an identifier for a Help topic and the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得說明主題的識別項，以及與這個可存取物件相關之通往說明檔的路徑。

trans-unit.source: An identifier for a Help topic, or -1 if there is no Help topic.
trans-unit.target: 說明主題的識別項，如果沒有說明主題，則為 -1。

trans-unit.source: On return, the <paramref name="fileName" /> parameter will contain the path to the Help file associated with this accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no <see langword="IAccessible" /> interface specified.
trans-unit.target: 傳回時，<paramref name="fileName" /> 屬性將會包含與這個可存取物件相關的說明檔之路徑；如果沒有指定任何 <see langword="null" /> 介面，則會傳回 <see langword="IAccessible" />。

trans-unit.source: Pass the identifier to the WinHelp file specified by the `fileName` parameter to identify the desired Help topic.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼會傳遞至所指定的 WinHelp 檔案`fileName`參數來識別想要的說明主題。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the handle of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可存取物件的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" /> that represents the handle of the control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IntPtr" />，表示此控制項的控制代碼。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.Handle%2A> property for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> is equal to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> it is associated with.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.Handle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>等於<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Handle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of what the object does or how the object is used.
trans-unit.target: 取得物件的用途或物件使用方式的描述。

trans-unit.source: The description of what the object does or how the object is used.
trans-unit.target: 物件的用途或物件使用方式的描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object shortcut key or access key for an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取物件的物件快速鍵或便捷鍵 (Access Key)。

trans-unit.source: The object shortcut key or access key for an accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no shortcut key associated with the object.
trans-unit.target: 可存取物件的物件快速鍵或便捷鍵；如果沒有與該物件相關的快速鍵，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: All objects that have a shortcut key or access key should support this property.
trans-unit.target: 有快速鍵或便捷鍵的所有物件應該都支援此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accessible object name.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定可存取的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: The accessible object name.
trans-unit.target: 可存取的物件名稱。

trans-unit.source: Notifies accessibility client applications of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" />.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> 告知可及性用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
trans-unit.target: 要通知協助工具用戶端應用程式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies accessibility client applications of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> 告知可及性用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> object the accessibility client applications are to be notified of.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>每個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>物件的通知協助工具用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>屬性時設定，或是從通常呼叫方法的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method and pass in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> value of `Hide` from within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>值`Hide`從內的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
trans-unit.target: 要通知協助工具用戶端應用程式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" />。

trans-unit.source: The child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to notify of the accessible event.
trans-unit.target: 要通知協助工具事件的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> for the specified child control.
trans-unit.target: 將指定子控制項的指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> 告知協助工具用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: You must call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> object the accessibility client applications are to be notified of.
trans-unit.target: 您必須呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>每個方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>物件的通知協助工具用戶端應用程式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method is typically called when a property is set or from within an event handler.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>屬性時設定，或是從通常呼叫方法的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A> method and pass in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents> value of `Hide` from within from within the event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可能會呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject.NotifyClients%2A>方法並傳入<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents>值`Hide`內從內的事件處理常式<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.VisibleChanged?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> to notify the accessibility client applications of.
trans-unit.target: 要通知協助工具用戶端應用程式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" />。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 的識別項。

trans-unit.source: The child <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> to notify of the accessible event.
trans-unit.target: 要通知協助工具事件的子 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: Notifies the accessibility client applications of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> for the specified child control, giving the identification of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 將指定子控制項的指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleEvents" /> 告知可及性用戶端應用程式，提供 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> 的識別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the owner of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取物件的擁有人。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 擁有 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a check box control that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> class and creates a custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> for the derived class to use.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立衍生自的核取方塊控制項<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>類別，並建立自訂<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>使用衍生的類別。

trans-unit.source: The derived class, `MyCheckBox`, has an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button> by default so it appears as a toggle button.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生的類別`MyCheckBox`，具有<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox.Appearance%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Appearance.Button>依預設，它會顯示為的切換按鈕。

trans-unit.source: The derived <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> class, `MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`, overrides three properties to account for the difference in appearance.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>類別`MyCheckBoxControlAccessibleObject`，覆寫外觀差異列入考量的三個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parent of an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得可存取之物件的父系。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents the parent of an accessible object, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no parent object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" />，表示可存取物件的父系，如果並沒有父物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of this accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個可存取之物件的角色。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回代表目前物件的字串。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the current object.
trans-unit.target: 表示目前物件的字串。
